name: i3x-explorer
description: Cross-platform desktop client for exploring I3X API servers

scripts.build: npm run clean && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.build:mac: npm run clean && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac
scripts.build:mac:arm64: npm run clean && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac --arm64
scripts.build:mac:x64: npm run clean && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac --x64
scripts.build:mac:universal: npm run clean && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac --universal
scripts.build:win: npm run clean && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --linux
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac --win --linux
